column2:
"The first Claris Claes...
The Legendary Heroes before me..."
"Oh no no no, isn't legendary is pushing it? It was 40 years ago at best."

"I was just really good, almost
cheating. In terms of ARKS strength,
a 2nd generation is above than me."

"And strictly speaking,
I'm not Claris Claes."
"Not Claris Claes?"

"WWell, it's hard to explain...
The photons that exist within me
are named Claris Claes."
"Eh? Ehhh?"

"Hmm, still don't understand...
Hmm...oh! Yes, that's right!
I had a double personality."
"Double... personality?"

"I had a weak constitution, so I
was bedridden. Because I had so
much spare time, I was constantly
talking to my photons."

"Then suddenly it had its own
personality. I was surprised at
first."

"Though, the people around me were
more surprised than I was. She had
a very rude way of talking."

"I would always leave it to her when
I was struggling to move my body
or was facing off in combat."

"She was always willing to do so,
so they named her Claris Claes."

"That's why Gi-kun and Ri-chan
don't call me Claris Claes."

"I don't mind whichever you decide
to call me, but for my sake,
please call me Alma."
"Uh... Yes, I understand."
"Well then. Would you stop being so formal?"
"Uh... Yes, I understand."
"How's the First Claris Claes doing inside your body Alma?"

"She gave up my body...
then disappeared."
"Gave up your body...?"

"Hm, that's not right...
Umm, she gave up my body and
became my body."
"In other words, my body is Claris Claes and my heart is Alma."

"Did Claris Claes
protect Alma...?"

"I guess so... Saying that either
one of us protected each other is
a bit rude."

"Her last words were
\"I won't be borrowing this!\""

"Oh, I guess that makes me
Claris Claes too. I should get
used to being called that here."
